full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for W0133-23T009 - Waterjet Cutter**
==========================================================

### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3644169770
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-29 T 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-09-19

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact**: Darlene Thorne, (extSite=MTY5ODgwMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-10-31
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-14

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence, 19 Wing Comox, 19th Military Engineer Support Squadron, Royal Canadian Electrical and Mechanical Engineers (RCEME) Machine Shop has a need for a Waterjet Cutter with the following specifications:

* Computer Numeric Control (CNC) 3 Axis System functionality
* Capacity to handle three (3) one-year optional software upgrades
* On-site maintenance service, on-site preventive maintenance service, and technical support services

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to contractors authorized under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Regions of Opportunity

No regions of opportunity are specified.

### Regions of Delivery

* British Columbia

### How to Respond

To participate, contractors must access the tender through the [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988033](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988033)  URL and follow the instructions provided. - CLIQUE ICI (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988033?extsite=MTY5ODgwMzNfQU4
